details.Appearance: Annaline has eggshell blue skin and deep green hair. However she has many other characters she often plays which have different appearances.
details.Personality Traits: Flattery is my preferred trick for getting what I want. When I look pretty and give compliments, I can achieve anything.
details.Ideals: Independence. I am a free spirit – no one tells me what to do.
details.Bonds: I have an ex lover I seek to one day find again. I swindled her, but it’s all water under the bridge… right?
details.Flaws: I can't resist swindling people who are richer or more powerful than me. I can’t help it - they just don’t deserve their money.

Race Features.title: Amphibious
Race Features.desc: You can breathe air and water.

Race Features.title: Darkvision
Race Features.hover: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Race Features.title: Emissary of the Sea
Race Features.desc: You can communicate simple ideas to any Beast, Elemental, or Monstrosity that has a swimming speed. It can understand your words, though you have no special ability to understand it in return.

Race Features.title: Control Air and Water
Race Features.desc: You can cast Fog Cloud with this trait. Once you cast a spell with this trait, you can’t cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest.
Race Features.hover: Starting at 3rd level, you can cast Gust of Wind with this trait, and starting at 5th level, you can also cast Wall of Water with it. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for all three spells.

Class Features.title: Tempestuous Magic
Class Features.desc: You can use a bonus action on your turn immediately before or after you cast a spell of 1st level or higher. Doing so allows you to fly up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

Charlatan Background.title: Favourite Scheme
Charlatan Background.desc: I put on new identities like clothes. I’ve been every girl, and plenty of others too.

Charlatan Background.title: False Identity
Charlatan Background.desc:
You have created a second identity that includes documentation, established acquaintances, and disguises that allow you to assume that persona.
You can forge documents including official papers and personal letters, as long as you have seen an example of the kind of document or the handwriting you are trying to copy.
